channel.title: How to put server online
channel.description: How do i put my server online this is very confusing to me

item.title: How to put server online
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

[quote=“1stimeCoder, post:9, topic:282698”][quote author=Owner Nader link=topic=373578.msg2817948#msg2817948 date=1244399733]

What you want to do if you have a client. Go in your [color=red]CLIENT FOLDER NOT your SOURCE FOLDER After you are in your CLIENT FOLER Look for somthing called “CLIENT” press CTRL+F and search for IP or IP ADRESS It will show the ip adress of the person that made the client. What you want to do is change it to your IP ADRESS So it connects to your computer.
[/quote]LMfao its wrong,
To change the current server ip on a client u need to go on GUI.java or EGUI.java ,
Client.java is only to change client title and All this,

I know read what i said carefully I said “Client Folder” as in running a client not the folder to change the tittles and stuff and the GUI I think is for Updates correct me if im wrong but if you go into “client” in your “CLIENT FOLER” you can change that persons IP to yours.[/quote]Well kk lol,

Read full topic

item.title: How to put server online
item.dc:creator: @1stimeCoder 1stimeCoder
item.description:
@1stimeCoder wrote:

[quote=“Owner Nader, post:8, topic:282698”][quote author=1stimeCoder link=topic=373578.msg2817943#msg2817943 date=1244399507]
What you want to do if you have a client. Go in your [color=red]CLIENT FOLDER NOT your SOURCE FOLDER After you are in your CLIENT FOLER Look for somthing called “CLIENT” press CTRL+F and search for IP or IP ADRESS It will show the ip adress of the person that made the client. What you want to do is change it to your IP ADRESS So it connects to your computer.
[/quote]LMfao its wrong,
To change the current server ip on a client u need to go on GUI.java or EGUI.java ,
Client.java is only to change client title and All this,[/quote]

I know read what i said carefully I said “Client Folder” as in running a client not the folder to change the tittles and stuff and the GUI I think is for Updates correct me if im wrong but if you go into “client” in your “CLIENT FOLER” you can change that persons IP to yours.

Read full topic

@1stimeCoder wrote:

What you want to do if you have a client. Go in your [color=red]CLIENT FOLDER NOT your SOURCE FOLDER After you are in your CLIENT FOLER Look for somthing called “CLIENT” press CTRL+F and search for IP or IP ADRESS It will show the ip adress of the person that made the client. What you want to do is change it to your IP ADRESS So it connects to your computer.

item.title: How to put server online
item.dc:creator: @1stimeCoder 1stimeCoder
item.description:
@1stimeCoder wrote:

[quote=“Soul-Scape, post:2, topic:282698”]Ok pay attention because this is really complicated.

Step 1. Double-Click Run.bat or it could be called Runserver.bat

Step 2. Minimize the window

There you go I know it maybe really hard but just see if you can do it.[/quote]

No need to be mean, If you have a router you will need to Port-Foward If you dont have a router you should just beable to click run. Put in your [color=red]IP ADRESS or if you have a [color=red]CLIENT use that but if it’s your IP just type it in and it should work

HOPE THIS HELPED!

Read full topic

item.title: How to put server online
item.dc:creator: @Soul-Scape Soul-Scape
item.description:
@Soul-Scape wrote:

Ok pay attention because this is really complicated.

Step 1. Double-Click Run.bat or it could be called Runserver.bat

Step 2. Minimize the window

There you go I know it maybe really hard but just see if you can do it.

Read full topic
